TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {219955=Zensar Technologies Recommended on Mar 24th 2015, 221264=Idea Cellular is in the Telecommunications - Service sector. The current market capitalisation stands at Rs 61,430.02 crore. The company management includes Kumar Mangalam Birla - Non Executive Chairman, Himanshu Kapania - Managing Director, Sanjeev Aga - Non Executive Director, Rajashree Birla - Non Executive Director, Shridhir Sariputta Hansa Wijayasuriya - Non Executive Director, Arun Thiagarajan - Independent Director, Gian Prakash Gupta - Independent Director, Mohan Gyani - Independent Director, Tarjani Vakil - Independent Director, P Murari - Independent Director, R C Bhargava - Independent Director, Madhabi Puri Buch - Independent Director. It is listed on the BSE with a BSE Code of 532822 and the NSE with an NSE Code of IDEA. Its Registered office is at Suman Tower, Plot No. 18,,Sector-11 Gandhinagar,Gujarat - 382011. Their Registrars are Bigshare Services Pvt. Ltd., 134546=28 July 2015, 135057=UnitedBrewerie Jul Fut, 135764=JSWSteel Jul Fut}
